properties.name: Valle de Cocora
properties.description: World's tallest palm trees (wax palms up to 200 feet) on misty green hills

properties.name: Cartagena Old Town
properties.description: UNESCO walled colonial city on Caribbean coast with vibrant colors and history

properties.name: Tayrona National Park
properties.description: White sand beaches with palm-fringed Caribbean coastline and jungle backdrop

properties.name: Ciudad Perdida (Lost City)
properties.description: Ancient city older than Machu Picchu, reached by multi-day jungle trek

properties.name: Cano Cristales
properties.description: River of Five Colors with stunning aquatic plants creating rainbow effect

properties.name: Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta
properties.description: World's highest coastal mountain range peaking at 5,775 meters

properties.name: Rock of Guatape (El Penol)
properties.description: Iconic 220m monolith with 715 steps and stunning reservoir views

properties.name: Salt Cathedral of Zipaquira
properties.description: Underground cathedral 200m deep in salt mine, declared First Wonder of Colombia

properties.name: Medellin (Comuna 13)
properties.description: Transformed neighborhood with famous outdoor escalators and vibrant street art

properties.name: Tatacoa Desert
properties.description: Otherworldly red and grey badlands, premier stargazing destination
